sourcesContent:
import { View, Text, Image, Pressable, TextInput } from "react-native";

import { styles } from './style';

export default function Profile() {
    return (
        <View className="flex-1" style={styles.container}>
            <View className="title-section">
                <Text className="text-center">Tela de Perfil</Text>
            </View>
            <View className="items-center">
                <View>
                    <View>
                        <View style={styles.avatar}>
                            <Image source={require('../../assets/img/profile/user-default.png')} style={styles.avatarImg} className="w-full h-full object-cover" />
                        </View>
                        <Pressable style={styles.avatarEdit}>
                            <Text style={styles.avatarEditText}>edit</Text>
                        </Pressable>
                    </View>
                    <Text className="text-center">Usu치rio</Text>
                </View>
            </View>

            <View>
                <View><TextInput placeholder="Usu치rio" placeholderTextColor="#ddd"></TextInput></View>
                <View><TextInput placeholder="Usu치rio" placeholderTextColor="#ddd"></TextInput></View>
                <View><TextInput placeholder="Usu치rio" placeholderTextColor="#ddd"></TextInput></View>
                <Pressable>
                    <Text>Atualizar Perfil</Text>
                </Pressable>
            </View>
        </View>
    );
}
